title: Get filtered dogs
description: Filter route will only work if given a query, see available queries below

title: Get single dog by name
description: Dog's name is case insensitive and if name is more than one word spaces are represented by space ' '

title: Get filtered dogs from a category
description: Filter route will only work if given a query, see available queries below

title: Get all colors
description: colors are initially sorted in ascending order

title: Get all filterd colors
description: Filter route will only work if given a query, see available queries below

title: Get single image
description: Dog's name is case sensitive and if name is more than one word spaces are represented by underscore '_' and must end with '.jpg' key
